basic_information.committee_name: COB - College of Business Scholarship Committee

description: The Business Excellence Scholarship is open to all undergraduate declared business majors who have a cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher. Applicants must have successfully completed a minimum of 30 credit hours at the time of application. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate students Declared business majors Cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher Must have completed 30+ hours

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
